title: Social Media Handles and Contact Info Extractor

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Website URLs for the crawler to scrape.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfig.description: You can use an Apify Proxy to bypass IP bans (turn it on if you are experiencing timeout errors).

maxDepth.title: Maximum Link Depth
maxDepth.description: The number of pages away from the original website that the crawler should scrape.

maxRequests.title: Maximum Requests
maxRequests.description: The maximum number of pages the crawler should scrape.

liveView.title: Store Screenshots
liveView.description: Whether the crawler should store screenshots of the scraped pages.

considerChildFrames.title: Crawl Frames
considerChildFrames.description: Whether the crawler should inspect code loaded inside of HTML frames.

sameDomain.title: Stay within Domain
sameDomain.description: Whether the crawler should only scrape links within the given domain.
